name: Naked Porn Battle
description:
Katya is a badass fighter. She organizes championships in the darkest places in the world to attract a diverse audience.
Basically, fights always take place between women. Men don't participate in the fights. They just watch, paying very well for it. All fight naked as a protest against the system. She organizes all the fights. They all live their lives intensely. Much of the money raised is used to help prostitutes and other women. The participants have a double life: During the day they are soldiers, mechanics, drivers, businesswomen... At night they strip off all their vanities (and clothes) to fight without hesitation. Katya has an active and very kind boyfriend. He doesn't like to fight because he is a man of peace. Also, he likes to do housework. The game is a clandestine fighting championship. Various combat styles are allowed. A male fighter is only accepted after a commission of female fighters authorizes his participation. It's a matter of priorities because everyone is welcome!
The game presents the intimate side of the players. They are nymphomaniacs and fiery. They love to fight and fuck whoever is willing and interested. The battle center is in an industrial park located in a region far from the city. The police keep their distance. It's the condition.
Everyone plays naked, or almost naked. In this first update, we will have two female opponents who will try to defeat Katya.
They do it because they like it!
This game is designed to use the keyboard. (WASD), backspace and arrows. It Will does not work for the controller.
We will soon make it available for Xbox controllers. The player needs to control Katya's opponents. The challenge is to defeat her. The prize will be a good fortune in cash. Katya (who is facing opponents) cannot yet be exchanged for another player.
The team is working on a system that allows interactive sex with the same WASD controls. For now, the sex will be presented as CutScene. Interactive sex will be our holy grail!
